languages.text: Ввиду того, что ряды подполья множились с каждым днем, было принято безжалостное решение о показательных казнях. Множество обитателей Януса было умерщвлено, остальные же преисполнились таким ужасом, что на планете началась богоугодная охота на изменников и еретиков. Помимо множества невиновных, пострадавших по ошибке, был уничтожен и костяк городского подполья, что вынудило их отступить из крупных поселений.

traits.locale_text: Ввиду того, что ряды подполья множились с каждым днем, было принято безжалостное решение о показательных казнях. Множество обитателей Януса было умерщвлено, остальные же преисполнились таким ужасом, что на планете началась богоугодная охота на изменников и еретиков. Помимо множества невиновных, пострадавших по ошибке, был уничтожен и костяк городского подполья, что вынудило их отступить из крупных поселений.

languages.text: Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.
languages.original_text: Ввиду того, что ряды подполья множились с каждым днем, было принято безжалостное решение о показательных казнях. Множество обитателей Януса было умерщвлено, остальные же преисполнились таким ужасом, что на планете началась богоугодная охота на изменников и еретиков. Помимо множества невиновных, пострадавших по ошибке, был уничтожен и костяк городского подполья, что вынудило их отступить из крупных поселений.

Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

languages.text: 反乱軍の勢力は日ごとに増したため、公開処刑の執行という残酷な決定がなされた。多くのヤヌス住民が速やかに処刑されていく一方、残った住民は甚大な恐怖に囚われた。その結果、住民は義憤から惑星中で反逆者狩りや異端者狩りを始めた。多くの罪なき人々が不当に殺されたものの、都市部に潜む反逆的な裏社会の主力を壊滅させ、暴徒を主要都市から追い出すことに成功した。
languages.original_text: Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍の勢力は日ごとに増したため、公開処刑の執行という残酷な決定がなされた。多くのヤヌス住民が速やかに処刑されていく一方、残った住民は甚大な恐怖に囚われた。その結果、住民は義憤から惑星中で反逆者狩りや異端者狩りを始めた。多くの罪なき人々が不当に殺されたものの、都市部に潜む反逆的な裏社会の主力を壊滅させ、暴徒を主要都市から追い出すことに成功した。

languages.text: 由于叛乱分子的队伍日益壮大，当局无情地采取了公开处决的手段。许多加努斯居民遭到了立刻处决，存活下来的居民陷入了恐慌之中。整颗行星爆发了一场追捕叛徒与异端分子异端的正义行动。虽然许多无辜居民惨遭杀害，但城市地下叛军的行动基地被成功摧毁，叛乱分子也被迫放弃了主要城市。
languages.original_text: Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

traits.locale_text: 由于叛乱分子的队伍日益壮大，当局无情地采取了公开处决的手段。许多加努斯居民遭到了立刻处决，存活下来的居民陷入了恐慌之中。整颗行星爆发了一场追捕叛徒与异端分子异端的正义行动。虽然许多无辜居民惨遭杀害，但城市地下叛军的行动基地被成功摧毁，叛乱分子也被迫放弃了主要城市。

languages.text: Dado que el número de rebeldes aumentaba cada día, se tomó la implacable decisión de celebrar ajusticiamientos públicos. Muchos habitantes de Janus fueron ejecutados sumariamente, y cundió tal pánico entre el resto que se produjo una justificada cacería de traidores y herejes por todo el planeta. Además de los numerosos inocentes que perdieron la vida injustamente, las células urbanas de los rebeldes fueron aniquiladas y los insurgentes tuvieron que abandonar las principales ciudades.
languages.original_text: Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Dado que el número de rebeldes aumentaba cada día, se tomó la implacable decisión de celebrar ajusticiamientos públicos. Muchos habitantes de Janus fueron ejecutados sumariamente, y cundió tal pánico entre el resto que se produjo una justificada cacería de traidores y herejes por todo el planeta. Además de los numerosos inocentes que perdieron la vida injustamente, las células urbanas de los rebeldes fueron aniquiladas y los insurgentes tuvieron que abandonar las principales ciudades.

languages.text: Da die Reihen der Rebellen täglich wuchsen, wurde die harte Entscheidung getroffen, öffentliche Hinrichtungen durchzuführen. Viele Einwohner von Janus wurden umgehend getötet, und der Rest bekam so viel Angst, dass auf dem ganzen Planeten eine regelrechte Jagd auf Verräter und Ketzer ausbrach. Neben den vielen unrechtmäßig getöteten Unschuldigen wurde aber auch der Kern des Rebellenuntergrunds in den Städten vernichtet, und die Aufständischen mussten die größeren Städte verlassen.
languages.original_text: Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Da die Reihen der Rebellen täglich wuchsen, wurde die harte Entscheidung getroffen, öffentliche Hinrichtungen durchzuführen. Viele Einwohner von Janus wurden umgehend getötet, und der Rest bekam so viel Angst, dass auf dem ganzen Planeten eine regelrechte Jagd auf Verräter und Ketzer ausbrach. Neben den vielen unrechtmäßig getöteten Unschuldigen wurde aber auch der Kern des Rebellenuntergrunds in den Städten vernichtet, und die Aufständischen mussten die größeren Städte verlassen.

languages.text: Les rangs des rebelles se gonflant jour après jour, une décision radicale fut prise : celle de procéder à des exécutions publiques. Nombre des habitants de Janus furent immédiatement mis à mort, et les survivants se trouvèrent pris d'une terreur telle qu'une chasse aux traîtres et aux hérétiques balaya toute la planète. En plus des nombreux innocents injustement tués, le noyau dur du réseau clandestin des rebelles fut détruit, ce qui força les contestataires à fuir les grandes agglomérations.
languages.original_text: Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Les rangs des rebelles se gonflant jour après jour, une décision radicale fut prise : celle de procéder à des exécutions publiques. Nombre des habitants de Janus furent immédiatement mis à mort, et les survivants se trouvèrent pris d'une terreur telle qu'une chasse aux traîtres et aux hérétiques balaya toute la planète. En plus des nombreux innocents injustement tués, le noyau dur du réseau clandestin des rebelles fut détruit, ce qui força les contestataires à fuir les grandes agglomérations.

languages.text: İsyancı nüfus gün geçtikçe artınca halka açık infazlar gerçekleştirme kararı alındı. Pek çok Janus sakini bu kararla birlikte ölüme mahkûm edildi, geri kalanların da büyük bir dehşete kapılmasıyla gezegen çapında büyük bir telaş başladı. Bu da en ufak bir durumda herkesin hedef olmasına neden oldu. Haksız yere öldürülen masumlar olsa da kentteki isyancı örgütlerinin merkezi çökertildi, asiler büyük şehirlerden çekilmek zorunda kaldı.
languages.original_text: Since the rebels' ranks were swelling by the day, the ruthless decision was made to hold public executions. Many of Janus's inhabitants were immediately put to death, while the rest were caught in the grip of such terror that a righteous hunt for traitors and heretics broke out across the planet. In addition to the many innocents unjustly killed, the core of the urban rebel underground was destroyed, forcing the insurrectionists to abandon the major cities.
